notes: Students must earn C- or better in all COSC courses. Prerequisites strictly enforced.

courses.name: Programming Languages and Paradigms
courses.description: Study of programming language concepts and paradigms

courses.name: Fundamentals of Software Engineering
courses.description: Software life cycle, requirements, design, testing, maintenance

courses.name: Software Design
courses.description: Advanced software design patterns and architectures

courses.name: Software Development Practices
courses.description: Modern software development practices and tools

courses.name: Fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: AI concepts, search algorithms, machine learning fundamentals

courses.name: Introduction To Computer Networks
courses.description: Data communications, network protocols and architecture

courses.name: Interactive Computer Graphics
courses.description: Introduction to graphics hardware and software systems

courses.name: Real-Time Systems and Embedded Programming
courses.description: Real-time operating systems and embedded system design

courses.name: Data Science II
courses.description: Advanced data science techniques and applications

courses.name: Security Analytics
courses.description: Security data analysis and threat detection

courses.name: Internet Computing
courses.description: Web applications, cloud computing, distributed systems

courses.name: Fundamentals of Medical Imaging
courses.description: Medical imaging systems and image analysis
